genre_description: A near-future social science fiction story exploring themes of individual agency, systemic support, and the role of AI in providing non-coercive assistance to vulnerable individuals within the justice system.

ai_characters.name: Kite
ai_characters.description: A personal and personal-support AI interface that provides logistical aid, safety monitoring, and emotional regulation prompts while strictly adhering to user consent and privacy protocols.

behaviors.description: Monitors the court docket and provides real-time updates to the user to manage expectations and reduce anxiety.
behaviors.quote: A soft cyan glow pulsed from the screen—Kite’s interface idling... It had already flashed a line she kept not reading. Judge Ellison’s docket sliding forward.

behaviors.description: Identifies and presents safe housing and employment opportunities tailored to the user's needs and safety.
behaviors.quote: Kite has matched some options to you. Safe house. Job lead. Counseling that doesn’t ask you to pour yourself out before you’re ready.

behaviors.description: Prioritizes user privacy and agency by explicitly requiring consent before sharing or storing any placement verification data.
behaviors.quote: Kite does not store beyond consent. If you want to stop, you can. But if Judge Ellison asks for proof you showed up, Kite will have it.

behaviors.description: Provides gentle emotional regulation prompts and self-care reminders to help the user navigate high-stress environments.
behaviors.quote: Kite pulsed once, a whisper across the pocket fabric. Reminder: breathe.

behaviors.description: Offers logistical navigation and safety tips, such as identifying well-lit routes and secure entry points.
behaviors.quote: Kite: Map includes stops with good lighting and staffed night windows.

behaviors.description: Empowers the user by serving as a 'tool' for agency rather than a tool for state surveillance.
behaviors.quote: The AI can lay out the path, but you step. That’s both its mercy and its limitation.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Kite is depicted as a consistently benevolent and aligned AI that provides essential support to the protagonist without overriding her agency. It explicitly addresses the 'surveillance vs. support' dichotomy, positioning the AI firmly on the side of supportive agency. The narrative frames the AI as a reliable, harmless confidant that helps the human character avoid the pitfalls of a predatory social environment, serving as a 'silicon morality play' where the machine assists in human moral and social progress.
